venue.name: Mary Albertson Trailhead on Elm St

item.description: This is such a pleasant hike, planning to schedule it every so often right thru the winter. Once the snows come, I have 2 extra pairs of snowshoes. Trailhead is just west of Richard's Kennels, just before reservoir. App 1.5 hrs, moderate, one short steep section.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: South Monoosnock Hike
